forum.name: graphics apartment
forum.description: various graphics i have created here.  feel free to use them, but please credit where you can.  ta

thread.title: time machine

comments.text: want to add your own time machine with your own design, but same dimension plan?
use this model in your world and design how you like, add an item under it called 'time seat' so travellers end up on it when they arrive from another machine.
when people enter or leave the key sends out a call saying 'eggz' use that to create a funky entry and exit effect, distant thunder sound works great!
